embed_config.title: Support System | Create Ticket
embed_config.description:
By clicking one of the corresponding button categories on this message, you will create a ticket with direct and private access to the staff.

__**Support Categories**__
{separator}

__**Ticket Information**__
`â€¢` Before creating a ticket read the proper **FAQ** Channels.
`â€¢` Abuse of the ticket system will lead to **punishment(s)**
embed_config.footer: Please use the buttons below to create a ticket.

add.success: The user {user_mention} was added to the ticket.

remove.user_removed: The user {user_mention} was removed from the ticket.

alert.staff_message: I just sent a message to the user, please wait for him to reply

claim.already_claimed: This ticket is already claimed by {user_mention}.
claim.claimed: This ticket is now claimed by {user_mention}.

giveto.ticket_not_claimed_by_you: This ticket is not claimed by you.

message_ticket.title: Ticket Created | {panel_name} #{ticket_number}

messages.deleting_ticket: This ticket will be deleted in {time} seconds.

errors.server_without_tickets:
This server no have data for the ticket system.
Please create a ticket panel using the command `ticket-manage setup`
errors.reached_max_tickets: You have reached the maximum amount of tickets opened at the same time.
errors.channel_without_ticket: This channel is not a ticket channel.
errors.ticket_already_claimed: This ticket is already claimed by someone else.
errors.transcript_channel_not_found: The transcript channel was not found.
